channel.title: How do i Change NPC Drops
channel.description:
Hello, I've been looking all throughout YouTube looking for how to change NPC drop. I'm trying to change the drop of man, ID is 1. But i cant figure it out. I'm using the source "Solitude". If anyone can help me with this problem. Please it would be great.
Thanks in advance.

item.title: How do i Change NPC Drops
item.dc:creator: @imstrength imstrength
item.description:
@imstrength wrote:

well im glad i could help you understand better than the guide did

Read full topic

item.title: How do i Change NPC Drops
item.dc:creator: @RyRyscape RyRyscape
item.description:
@RyRyscape wrote:

[quote=“imstrength, post:11, topic:463759”][quote author=RyRyscape link=topic=567394.msg4122778#msg4122778 date=1349960785]

jesus christ your all dumb.

use the npcdrops.TSM

should look something like this for a skeleton…which i have in my NPCDrops.TSM:

#skeleton
2037:25 995:150000 995:250000
6137:1 6139:1 6141:1 6147:1 6153:1

npcid
how often it will drop a rare item
normal drop ID
normal drop amount
rare drop id
rare drop amount

You’re*
[/quote]
thanks go mess with you’re .cfg file[/quote]

What’s a .cfg file?

Read full topic
